title: request
description: Auto generated JSON schema based on the 'request' file

submissions.description: Array containing details about FHL UK property update periods

periodId.description: An identifier for the update period, unique to the customer's UK property business.

fromDate.description:
The first day that the income, expenses and deduction period summary covers.

Must conform to the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

toDate.description:
The last day that the income, expenses and deduction period summary covers.

Must conform to the format: YYYY-MM-DD

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint.
